title: BOIS ITS MY FIRST POST
body:
After wasting 5-10 minutes reading some of these posts/comments I decided to make my first post after 5+ years of this game. 

Grow up people, you don't like something someone says?? You just wanna delete their post?? Grow up, who cares, don't let it affect you. There will always be be people saying crap you don't like or want to hear. Get over it. It's called the real world. 

FYI, yes I toned down my verbage begrudgingly bc I don't want to "offend" anyone on the internet god forbid

Hollar back all my homies who just wanna game and want everyone else to s.t.f.u

replies.body: You clearly didn't read enough of the posts, because Daniel Klein was discriminating males from being able to attend special events/meetings.

Go back to KiA. We dont need all of you rejects ceaselessly screaming about how riot is made of SJW nazis and the end is nigh because you took one thing out of context.

A week ago it was screaming about the reverse. Make up your angry little minds.
When did I ever say that Riot is filled with them?
